Great! Genius! {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Mark Achbar', 'Peter Wintonick'], 'Producers': ['Mark Achbar', 'Peter Wintonick', 'Francis Miquet', 'Dennis R. Buckley'], 'Studio': ['Necessary Illusions']} This neurolinguistics genious is just anothe puppet for the media, when asked "who killed JFK...?" He just says "Lee Harvey Oswald of course!!!... Who else?..." Too ironic for someone who calls himself an Anarchist and a Rebel, against what i wonder...

To hell with Chomsky Chomsky is a puppet a gatekeeper {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Sean Penn'], 'Producers': ['Art Linson', 'Sean Penn', 'Bill Pohlad'], 'Starring': ['Emile Hirsch', 'Marcia Gay Garden', 'William Hurt'], 'Studio': ['Paramount Pictures']} Production and execuition is perfect

love it.
do not miss it

go for it! bah {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Tom McGrath'], 'Producers': ['Lara Breay', 'Denise Nolan Cascino'], 'Starring': ['Will Ferrell', 'Tina Fey', 'Jonah Hill'], 'Studio': ['Paramount']} The underlying message in this movie is definitely nothing less than negative.
It just tells the kids that it wouldn't be such a bad idea to give the morally bad a chance to rule the world.
Full of occult symbolism and hidden messages.

If u r a grown up and admire well created animation, don't miss it Scary {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Stephen Chow', 'Derek Kwok'], 'Producers': ['Stephen Chow', 'Y.Y. Kong'], 'Starring': ['Shu Qi', 'Wen Zhang', 'Huang Bo'], 'Studio': ['Magnolia Pictures']} I love this movie
Surreal Five Stars Red Cliff International Version - Part I & Part II Tony Leung (Actor), Takeshi Kaneshiro (Actor), John Woo (Director) & 0 more Rated: Unrated Format: DVD Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Drama ["Red Cliff, the epic historical drama based on a legendary 208 A.D. battle that heralded the end of the Han Dynasty. A power hungry Prime Minister-turned-General Cao Cao seeks permission from the Han dynasty Emperor to organize a southward-bound mission designed to crush the two troublesome warlords who stand in his way, Liu Bei and Sun Quan. Vastly outnumbered by Cao Cao's brutal, fast-approaching army, the warlords band together to mount a heroic campaign, unrivaled in history; that changes the face of China forever."] {'Genre': 'Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'John Woo, Takeshi Kaneshiro, Tony Leung', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '4 hours and 48 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'Unrated (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.57 x 5.41 x 7.46 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Item model number': '10268', 'Director': 'John Woo', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, AC-3, Color, Dolby, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '4 hours and 48 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 23, 2010', 'Actors': 'Tony Leung, Takeshi Kaneshiro', 'Subtitles': 'English, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Magnolia Home Ent', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'} love this movie Five Stars {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Harold Ramis'], 'Producers': ['Harold Ramis'], 'Starring': ['Bill Murray', 'Richard Henzel', 'Andie MacDowell'], 'Studio': ['Sony Pictures Entertainment']} for those who haven't seen it, please do, Murray rocks forever Five Stars {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Theodore Melfi'], 'Producers': ['Theodore Melfi', 'Peter Chernin', 'Jenno Topping', 'Fred Roos'], 'Starring': ['Bill Murray', 'Melissa McCarthy', 'Naomi Watts']} murray murray murray Five Stars
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** The user remains deeply passionate about classic animation and artistic expressions in film, particularly from Slavic creators. Their recent interactions highlight an ongoing engagement with films that feature iconic performances and challenge traditional narrative structures.

- **Media Format Preference:** They continue to favor physical media, especially DVDs, valuing the tactile aspects that enhance their cinematic experiences.

- **Artistic Appreciation:** The user prioritizes warmth, intimacy, and compelling narratives in visual storytelling. Their discerning taste reflects an admiration for both renowned directors and emerging talents, indicating a sophisticated understanding of artistic merit.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user's rating patterns emphasize emotional impact and artistic quality, as evidenced by their high rating for a recent film featuring a celebrated performance. This demonstrates their enjoyment of films that provide joy and memorable characters, aligning with their preference for relatable themes.

- **Cultural Awareness:** They have a distinct preference for culturally rich, intellectually stimulating art, favoring global cinema over mainstream offerings. Their interest in complex themes continues to shape their viewing choices, promoting thoughtful interactions with diverse cinematic works.

Overall, the user exhibits a preference for captivating, emotionally resonant films rich in artful storytelling. Their latest engagement reflects a strong appreciation for distinguished performances and the significant contributions of filmmakers to the cinema landscape, further reinforcing their keen interest in critiquing authority and media narratives.
